ygData.subject: update on MM faction
ygData.msgSnippet: it worked like a charm :) i am now indifferent to the inhabitants of mistmoore castle (warmly if affected by wolf form.. yay!) and can freely explore the place
ygData.messageBody:
it worked like a charm :) i am now indifferent to the inhabitants of
mistmoore castle (warmly if affected by wolf form.. yay!) and can freely
explore the place :) that said, does anybody know where the maid and butler
can be found inside? not that i will kill them personally.. i'll just know
where to lead my friends to so they can camp the teeth for me ;) hehe...

sadly xicotl or lord mistmoore didnt pop up while i was there, but if i
happen to get screenshots at a later date i'll be sure to let you folks know.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
